name: Spicy Buffalo Chicken Bake
author: Better Than Bouillon
summary: This easy-to-make appetizer has all the flavor of hot and spicy Buffalo wings in a delicious dip.
ingredients: ½ cup Buffalo-style hot pepper sauce
1 tablespoon Better Than Bouillon® Roasted Chicken Base
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F
Add the cream cheese, milk, wing sauce, and chicken base to a medium sized mixing bowl
Add the chicken and mix well
Spread the chicken mixture into an 11x7-inch baking dish
Sprinkle the chicken with the cracker crumbs
Place the baking dish directly into the oven and bake for 15 to 20 minutes or until the cracker crumbs are golden brown
Carefully remove the baking dish from the oven and let cool for 5 minutes
Serve immediately with crackers or vegetables
